title: Geometric bound on structure factor
authors: Yugo Onishi, Alexander Avdoshkin, Liang Fu
abstract:
We show that quantum geometry sets a bound on the $q^4$ term in the static
structure factor $S(q)$. Bands that saturate this bound satisfy a form of
Laplace's equation, leading us to refer to them as \textit{harmonic bands}. We
provide some examples of harmonic bands in one- and two-dimensional systems,
including Landau levels.
